meta_description_localized.en: The 2017 New York Auto Show presents the latest in innovation.

post_content_localized.en:
The 2017 New York Auto Show presents the latest in innovation.

Set to usher in the latest trends in automobiles, this year’s Jacob Javits Convention Center Car Show, promises visitors a showcase of cutting-edge design and amazing innovation. There are going to be more than four floors of incredible displays from the globe’s automobile manufacturers and will be featuring the latest futuristic concept vehicles and newest cars. Over 1,000 trucks and cars will be on display at what has been labelled North America’s first and most attended auto show…dating back to the 1900’s.

This year’s New York Auto Show at the Jacob Javits Center will be held from March 30 – April 8. Whether you’re a car collector or simply love checking out the latest trends, this is the show to go to.

Every year before the show opens, a number of auto companies debut their latest productions and concepts for the press.

If you’re coming to New York for the show, book your stay with us at The Manhattan Club. We’re ideally located in midtown, close to all of the greatest  New York City attractions.
